abstract: Federal grand jury indicts Texas Lawyer Mikal C Watts in connection with accusations that he claimed to have signed up more than 40,000 clients seeking compensation from BP due to 2010 oil spill who either did not exist or were unaware they had been signed up for legal representation.
lead_paragraph: Mikal C. Watts claimed to have signed up more than 40,000 clients seeking compensation for economic damages, one of the most extensive client lists of any lawyer or firm.

headline.main: Indictment Ties Lawyer to Fraud in BP Spill
headline.print_headline: Indictment Ties Lawyer to Fraud in BP Spill

snippet: Mikal C. Watts claimed to have signed up more than 40,000 clients seeking compensation for economic damages, one of the most extensive client lists of any lawyer or firm.
